ej,haseb001,P,merrd901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,milla001,P,merrd901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,segud001,P,merrd901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,sutcr001,P,merrd901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,bosic001,P,merrd901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,charn001,P,merrd901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,pinil001,M,merrd901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,sassm001,P,merrd901,Bench-clearing brawl $Bill Haselman charged the mound; both benches emptied and a 20-minute brawl ensued; pitcher Chris Bosio, who recently returned after a broken collarbone, suffered another break in the melee; Jeff Tackett had a gash on his right cheek and Mark Williamson had a cut on his nose; ejected by HP umpire Durwood Merrill: Haselman, Bosio, Alan Mills, David Segui, Rick Sutcliffe, Norm Charlton, Mackey Sasser and Mariners manager Lou Piniella; pitcher Mike Mussina was not ejected
